## IMarketplace.getActiveOffers() method

Return all active offers for a direct listing.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getActiveOffers(listingId: BigNumberish): Promise<Offer[]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listingId | BigNumberish | Id of the listing to get offers for. |

<b>Returns:</b>
